title: Google TV Integrates Gemini AI for Natural Voice Commands at CES 2026
description: Google has integrated Gemini AI into Google TV, enabling natural language voice commands for adjusting settings like picture quality and audio, unveiled at CES 2026. This enhances accessibility, streamlines user experience, and positions Google ahead of competitors. The update promises a more intuitive future for smart home entertainment.
